Title(s): ‘The Dance of the Sevin Deidly Synnis’
_description: William Dunbar, ‘The Dance of the Sevin Deidly Synnis’ — 120 lines, generally in 12-line tail-rhyme stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Of fever ȝeir þe fyftene nychtfful lang be foir þe
                    dais lycht…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…That in þe dipest pitt of hellHe smorit þame with
                    ane smuik

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Off februar the xv nichtffull lang befoir the dayis
                    licht…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…That in the deipest pit of hellhe smorit þame with
                    smoik
CamMagPep2553.Editions:

            1927: 1.183-4.

Banna.First Lines:
Off februar the fyiftene nychtfull lang befoir the dayis
                    lycht…
Banna.Last Lines:
…That in the depest pot of hellhe smorit thame with
                    smvke
